item.title: Tech Interview Cheat Sheet: Must-Know Topics for All Rounds
item.description:
Tech Interview Cheat Sheet: Must-Know Topics for All Rounds

Overview

This cheat sheet covers the essential topics you need to master for acing technical interviews.

Sections

  1. DSA Essentials
    Focus on key concepts like Sorting, Trees, Graphs, and more.

  2. System Design
    Master high-level architecture concepts and trade-offs in system design.

  3. Behavioral Questions
    Prepare for questions on teamwork, challenges faced, and past achievements.
